Title: Massive ~2.3k Patch Series Would Improve Linux Build Times 50~80% & Fix "Dependency Hell"
Description: Longtime Linux kernel developer Ingo Molnar posted a massive set of patches today: 2,297 patches that have been in the works since late 2020 and completely rework the Linux kernel's header file hierarchy

Title: How I built a WFH Shed
ClonerAlliance Flint D4P - Standalone Dual-4K Video Overlay Device and Audio Mixing Station.
Description: 4K@60fps and 2K@144fps game overlay live streaming with multiple display modes using remote control. Capture and stream your gameplay/videos at 1080p@60fps instantly while enjoying recreational moments.
